mapper.select: SELECT m.perms FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{id} AND m.status = 0 AND m.menu_type in ('F', 'C') AND m.del_flag = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_menu` m WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C', 'M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE 1 = 1 AND ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C', 'M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
